description:
We are an employment agency and seeking the Accounting and HR Assistant for Japanese eyewear company in Torrance, CA.

They are a well-known eyeglass retailer in Japan, offering easy-to-wear and fashionable designs. They have a friendly staff and a comfortable working environment!

◉Company Industry:Retail

◉Salary: $20 - $25 / hour

◉Employment type: Part time

◉Benefits: Paid sick leave / Commuter benefits

  • Essential Functions ＜Accounting＞
  • Application for payment
  • Credit card usage history, receipt collection
  • Fixed asset management
  • Other Ad Hoc Tasks (e.g., new store related tasks)

＜HR＞

  • E-training management
  • Expense reimbursement management
  • HR related report creation/Update
  • Other Ad Hoc Tasks

＜Office Management＞

  • Office supply management
  • Other Ad Hoc Tasks

*Qualifications

  • High school or equivalent (G.E.D) education
  • Availability to work approximately 20 hours per week (ideally 4 hours per day, Monday to Friday)
  • Preferable if you have experience in accounting or HR
